name: ice-heal
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Cures freezing.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A spray-type medicine for freezing. It can be used once to defrost a Pokémon that has been frozen solid.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A spray-type medicine for freezing. It can be used once to defrost a Pokémon that has been frozen solid.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A spray-type medicine for treating freezing. It can be used to thaw out a single Pokémon that has been frozen solid.
